entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
